3: Tonight in Ayla's studio...
Yeah... I know the principle.
But...
It's like being confused about what to express with the new ideas you just remembered.
...You're right.
...What did I say to you already?
'If you want your voice to be heard, then you have to let others hear it.'
Wasn't there something else...?
Let me guess... As for how to frame the 'puzzle,' that is left to the creator...
At the very least, you need to at least think of the 'puzzle.'
That being said, no one said it was taboo to ask the audience for guidance. Right?
The so-called 'fourth wall' is just a wall in the formal sense of the word.
...You're right.
I'll be right back!
You should at least thank a person for giving you inspiration before running off...
Hmph...
Miss Celica!
Ah! What brings you here, Ayla?
Sorry! Can you give me authorization to read some data in the profiles for a bit?
Ah! My key!
Forget it. Just let her go.
President Hassen?
An artist with inspiration is harder to stop than a Musashi IX...
If she reads anything that she shouldn't, I'll tell Allen to keep a better handle on his people.
But for now... Let her read whatever she's looking for.
